detail_desc: Ankle boots in soft imitation suede with a concealed zip in one side. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Coat in patterned faux fur with a collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the front, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Detachable tie belt in imitation suede. Lined.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Belt in nubuck with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Jumper in soft, loose-knit chenille with a deep V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Longer at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned weave made from a cotton blend with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.

Set in soft cotton. Sleeveless blouse in a patterned weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour grosgrain side stripes. Elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly, zipped side pockets and an open back pocket.

Long, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with ties at the neck and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips and at the knees. Lined with a detachable V-neck underdress in jersey. The underdress has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.

Striped shirt in airy Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.
Fully lined swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top, one wide shoulder strap and a high cut at the back.
Dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.

Long, sleeveless dress in lace with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti straps. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, a seam at the waist, and a raw edge at the top and hem. Lined in a contrasting colour.

Set with a shirt and pair of chinos in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and fastener at the back. Lightly brushed chinos with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and side pockets. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a double-layered edge at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, high-waisted, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a press-stud and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.
Jacket in a sturdy pattern weave with welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and tapered legs.

Set with a top and trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Block-coloured top with a text print at the hem, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, block-coloured side stripes and ribbing at the hems.
Dress in sturdy jersey with a patterned taffeta skirt. Round neckline, cap sleeves and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a large bow and a voluminous, gathered, lined skirt.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in soft viscose jersey with a wide neckline and short cap sleeves.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Flounce over the shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch..

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Thong briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and string back. Two pairs of the thongs are ribbed.

Pull-on trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, low crotch and diagonal side pockets. Legs with shaping darts at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with buttons at the back, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a decorative tie detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in an airy organic linen and cotton weave with short, frilled sleeves, buttons down the front and covered elastication at the hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved top in striped, sturdy organic cotton jersey with a boat neck and buttons on one shoulder.
Long jumper in a soft, fine knit decorated at the top with plastic beads. Small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.

Lightweight running shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short running tights. Regular, elasticated drawstring waist with a key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the outer shorts is recycled.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Shorter top in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Partial overlap at the top with a tab and metal press-studs on one shoulder and a wrapover with narrow ties at the top and sides.
Longer, oversized jacket woven in a linen blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and large patch front pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved nursing tops in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Sandals with open toes, wrapover foot straps and elastication at the heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 8 cm.
Cotton jersey vest top with striped ribbing around the neckline and armholes and a mesh top layer with a print motif at the front.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Ankle-length legs with glittery stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Down jacket with a soft velour lining and detachable faux-fur lined hood. Zip down the front and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a wide foldover at the top, wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave and pair of shorts in stretch denim. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping satin with lace details. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative covered buttons at the front and a drawstring at the waist. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Metal chain bracelet with various decorations. Adjustable length 18-22.5 cm.
Jersey top with a motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short jersey top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, lined cups and a seam under the bust.
Top in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine knit with a button at the neck.
Treggings in soft twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Shorts in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a flock print motif on the front and long, cuffed sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and cuffed hems.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.

prod_name: S. Skinny HW Ankle Star Consc
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Pyjamas with a short top and bottoms in lightweight, ribbed jersey. Top with a round neckline and long sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and straight legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Unlined.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Biker trousers in imitation patent leather with a zip and button, decorative zips at the front and real back pockets. Slim legs with decorative seams at the knees and quilted sections.
